bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I cannot install streamline through pip3: <denchmark-code>pip3 install streamlit </denchmark-code>
dosent work, I get this error: <denchmark-code>streamlit hello -bash: /usr/local/bin/streamlit: No such file or directory </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>pip3 install streamlit </denchmark-code>
on MacOS <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
It should install streamlit <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Not installing streamlit <denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
I need specifically pip3 support to use all the python3 libraries as in MacOS pip3 is tied to Python 3 and pip is tied to Python2

comments.comment:
I figured it out. It was much easier to do this by
installing anaconda create Conda virtual env pip install streamlit (in anaconda pip is linked to python3.x)
